channel.title: The World's Best Prom Podcast
channel.description: On the face of it, Racine, Wisconsin, seems like any other humble, sweet-natured Midwestern town ... except it's mightily obsessed. And not with football or politics, like many other enclaves that dot the country, but with the senior prom. This fascinating documentary introduces viewers to Racine's residents, including a Catholic girl longing to explore the world and an impoverished teen seeking a way out through a solid education. Join the filmmakers for an in-depth and fun look at prom, Racine, and the World's Best Prom!
channel.itunes:subtitle: You've Never Seen a Prom Like This!
channel.itunes:summary: On the face of it, Racine, Wisconsin, seems like any other humble, sweet-natured Midwestern town ... except it's mightily obsessed. And not with football or politics, like many other enclaves that dot the country, but with the senior prom. This fascinating documentary introduces viewers to Racine's residents, including a Catholic girl longing to explore the world and an impoverished teen seeking a way out through a solid education. Join the filmmakers for an in-depth and fun look at prom, Racine, and the World's Best Prom!
channel.itunes:author: Matson Films

item.title: Episode 15: "Prom Plans"
item.description: Students tell us their prom plans. Surely you remember planning for prom years in advance? Flying to Hawaii to find a dress? Reserving an elephant for the ride there? It's all here ... only in Racine.

item.title: Episode 13: Meet Ben Adrian
item.description: Ben is the high school quarterback looking forward to leaving Racine. But there are two things left to do: celebrate prom and graduate. Join Ben as he gets ready for the World's Best Prom ... only in Racine!
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Ben is the high school quarterback looking forward to leaving Racine. But there are two things left to do: celebrate prom and graduate. Join Ben as he gets ready for the World's Best Prom ... only in Racine!

item.title: Episode 12: Meet Tonya Witherspoon
item.description: Tonya is a shy overachiever who dreams of becoming a forsenic pathologist. Her ex-boyfriend is taking her to prom and she has countless things to do before the big day. Join Tonya and others as they get ready for the World's Best Prom ... only in Racine!

item.title: Episode 5: A Portrait of Racine
item.description: A Portrait of Racine: Scenes from A Letter From Mom. Join us for a look at Racine, Wisconsin, 1951, from sailboats to helicopters to a 4th of July Parade to the crowning of Miss Goodwill to a dog show. Courtesy of the Racine Heritage Museum.
